title: The Museum Of Ice Cream Is Coming To Los Angeles | JoJo Wright | KISS 95.7
text:
The Museum Of Ice Cream Is Coming To Los Angeles posted by JoJo Wright - share 
Source: Getty 
Ever dream of visiting a real life Willy Wonka chocolate factory?! Well, this may be as close as it gets! Last Summer New Yorkers were lucky enough to experience the Museum of Ice Cream. Which was a month long pop up that featured a pool of sprinkles, edible balloons and a seesaw made of giant ice cream scoopers! 
Now that museum is set to come to Los Angeles! At this point the location isn't set, but LA Magazine reports that it could be somewhere in Santa Monica or Venice. Lets just hope wherever it is that there will be tons of tickets available, because in New York all 30,000 tickets sold out in 5 short days. WOAH! 
Fingers crossed I'll get to jump in the pool of sprinkles when it opens in March. A post shared by MUSEUM OF ICE CREAM (@museumoficecream) on Dec 15, 2016 at 10:07am PST A post shared by MUSEUM OF ICE CREAM (@museumoficecream) on Jul 30, 2016 at 1:34pm PDT 
Source: Instagram
